name: Ludum Dare 45 Submission
description:
Had to scrap one of my original ideas I was working on throughout the first day, so I scrapped all of it and quite literally "started with nothing." Anyway, I'm still proud of what I made and I hope you enjoy it.

P.S: This was my first time using UIs in unity so scaling is hella wack.

Controls:

Left/Right: A/D or Left Arrow/Right

Up/Down: W/S or Up Arrow/Down

Jump: W or Up Arrow

Source Code: https://www.dropbox.com/sh/t2bnflwxu5tslnm/AACsihuOdi3dz1D1ISfMtKrSa?dl=0
